description.narrative: Motto to Empower the Health, Education and Rights (MEHER) emergence is result of youth commitment to serve marginalized communities. Motto to Empower the Health, Education and Rights (MEHER) was established in March 2003 by a dedicated and committed group of young professionals and it has been registered on 08th February 2005. Initial objective of MEHER establishment was to organize local communities for self-help approach for their communal development. Under this project, to enhance the capacity of District Disaster Management Authority (DDMA), Local Forums and Disaster Prone Communities for effective and efficient Preparedness <(>&<)> Emergency Response. Motto to Empower the Health, Education and Rights intends to network and coordinate disaster risk management and response in district Jaffarabad through building the capacity of community and District Disaster Management Authority (DDMA). Develop reputation of district line departments like Disaster Management system among the disaster prone communities by developing information dissemination system and well coordinated disaster response efforts by the District Government. Oxfam Novib has contributed in building the capacity of Motto to Empower the Health, Education and Rights (MEHER) for effective, timely and appropriate humanitarian responsein line with the humanitarian standards for Contingency Planning, Logistics and Warehouse management, Emergency Procurement and capacity building.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security
